name: ConsoleForms
tagline: A C#.NET library allowing to make winform-like componets inside console windows.
body:
### The easiest way to move from WinForms to console without losing much.
ConsoleForms is all about making almost every WinForm function into a .dll file, If you need to move from WinForms to Console, you can
use this to almost effortlessly port your WinForm code, all you need is a few changes.

### Why was this created?
My friend, @SirJosh3917 created his own dll for this once, but it was never finished & he can't find it anymore, so I decided to make my own.

### Where can I get it?
Right now this project isn't complete, but if you're good at C#.NET, you can help us code it! Just get the latest development branch and start working!

### Authors and Contributors
@Joyesh - Main developer

@SirJosh3917 - Small bits of code, helps when I need help.

### Contact me
The best way to contact me is via my contact email (joyesh708@gmail.com) because I read that almost every day, but if it's a bug or issue in code, please report it as an issue on the GitHub page!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
